product_name: INNO Shadow 16 Cargo Roof Box - Matte Black
long_description: The single-handed, dual-side opening of the matte black INNO Shadow 16 Cargo Roof Box makes loading and unloading gear easy. The 16 cu. ft. capacity accommodates up to 8 pairs of skis or 6 snowboards. Universal mounting hardware mounts to square, round and most factory crossbars. Durable, lightweight 3-layer ABS construction; stiff bottom offers strength and durability. Includes locks and keys; matte black finish.
short_description: The single-handed, dual-side opening of the matte black INNO Shadow 16 Cargo Roof Box makes loading and unloading gear easy. The 16 cu. ft. capacity accommodates up to 8 pairs of skis or 6 snowboards.
